data.text: E Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ziam fam!
Gumazir aghuibar boriba, nguazir kamɨn ikɨ
Gumazir guizbangɨra mɨgɨa pura uan biziba anɨdim,
Gumazir aghuim irɨghan kogh egh tugh gavgavigh mamaghɨra ikiam.
An osɨmtɨzir otivibar mɨgɨrɨgɨaba baragh atiatingan kogham.
A nɨghnɨzir avɨribagh amua atiatir puvatɨ.
A bizir bar avɨriba gumazir onganarazibagh amibagh anɨdi.
Gumazir kuraba, gumazir aghuimɨn dabirabimɨn ganɨva puvɨram ataram.
